reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: SOCO office PMER support for the Country Programme

description.narrative: FCA´s programme in Somalia remains focused on both humanitarian and development work, while the first one is developed in Somaliland, FCA supports the New Deal implementation in Somalia.The MFA’s support is fundamental for the presence of FCA in the cou ntry and the achievement of the planned goals. In 2016, FCA’s Somalia Country Programme will be strengthening its work around the Peacebuilding and State-Building Goal 1, Inclusive Politics, by supporting the newly created Federal Entities (South West In terim Administration, Central Regions Interim Administration and Interim Juba Administration) via a bottom-up approach. FCA and partners will be working in the most neglected districts of the stated States, in order to ensure their engagement to the federa l process. In addition, FCA will continue to respond to the humanitarian needs in Somaliland, providing assistance to the people of concern such as Internally Displaced Persons (IDPs), refugees and returnees. FCA Somalia works towards a constantly improved accountable and efficient programme delivering high quality services to the Somali population in a transparent fashion.Objectives:The overall objective is to improve effectiveness, quality, and impact of the FCA Country Programme focusing on the thematic areas through established field presence.Expected Results: • Strategic and operational planning for the country implemented• Planning and monitoring of the country programme and projects performed• Thematic advice to the country programme and project s provided• Institutional capacity of local partners built• Dialogue with authorities and various actors at a country level facilitated• Networking at both country and regional level • Cooperation with other stakeholders intensified• Support and input for communication purposes ensured• Access to funding opportunities broadened• Coordination of work and cooperation with other aid organisations • Increased input of partner organisations and topics from the region into the lobby and advocacy w ork ensured• Resourcing and staffing of the Country Office• The management and administration of the Country Office strengthened• Safety and security of FCA and our partner staff ensuredRights-holders/beneficiaries: • FCA Staff• Local Partners´ Staff• Federal Government of Somalia• Regional Authorities• Genuine Clan Leaders• Women Groups• Youth• Business Community• Religious LeadersImplementing partner: FCA
